# Suggested GitHub Topics

When creating your GitHub repository, consider adding these topics for better discoverability:

## Primary Topics
- `mcp`
- `bugzilla`
- `bug-tracking`
- `model-context-protocol`

## Technology Topics
- `python`
- `fastmcp`
- `httpx`
- `async`

## Use Case Topics
- `ai-integration`
- `claude-desktop`
- `cursor-ide`
- `vscode-extension`

## Category Topics
- `mcp-server`
- `api-client`
- `bugzilla-api`
- `automation`

## How to Add Topics
1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About"
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics listed above
4. Press Enter after each topic
5. Click "Save changes"

These topics will help others discover your project when searching for MCP servers, Bugzilla integrations, or bug tracking tools.
